ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in 1/3" SONY Effio CCD Color DSP Security Camera. NTSC signal system
700TV Lines horizontal resolution. Auto IRIS Electronic Shutter
AES On/Off, BLC On/Off. Operating Temperature: -10 degree ~ +50 degree
C/CS Lens Mount. 0.01 Lux Mini Illumination
Package included: 1 of box camera (body only), 1 of 3.5-8mm auto IRIS vari-focal lens, 1 of 12V DC regulated CCTV power supply, 1 x adjustable camera mounting bracket and 1 of security warning sticker
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Home Body Box Surveillance Camera Day Night Vision 700TVL High Resolution Built-in 1/3" SONY Effio CCD 3.5-8mm Zoom Lens for CCTV DVR Surveillance System with Power Supply and Camera Bracket 1DV
